title: Can you get gemstones from Winter Chests
body: Title^ might spend RP on the chests cause I have leftover and I don't really want any skins that are coming out.

replies.body:
Yes, but the drop rate chance is the same as regular hextech chests. Check out [this article](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016) for more information on how the crafting works for Snowdown this year!

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for reply, already bought some chests and got a gemstone though lol.
http://image.prntscr.com/image/83e2bf4f6eba4cc78d8131bb68336b76.png
9 more for hextech Annie HYPE
